channel.title: forensics on It's a Dev's world
channel.description: Recent content in forensics on It's a Dev's world

item.title: USB Detection in Windows
item.description: Windows Event Logs Security Event Logs 6416 – A new external device was recognized by the system. 4663 – An attempt was made to access an object (useful to monitor file access on USB drives). 4656 – A handle to an object was requested. 4624 / 4634 – Logon/logoff events to correlate user activity with USB usage. System Event Logs From the Microsoft-Windows-DriverFrameworks-UserMode/Operational log: 20001 – A USB device was connected.
